column5: A friend of mine at work has an uncle that took these pictures two winters ago.  Thought everyone might enjoy or maybe want a new wallpaper for their computer.

Wow those are some great pics. My wife has relatives in Lab City and has visited and witnessed them. Hope to one day as well.  "Aurora borealis The icy sky at night Paddles cut the water In a long and hurried flight"   "Pocahontas" by Neil Young
I have been fortunate enouh to witness this specticle a few times and am amazed every time thanks for the cool shots
I have seem them..never that nice my photos never really captured them for some reason maybe I need a tripod and longer shutter speed
Why don't you just Photoshop them. I thought that was your area of expertise!
WOW!!!! Thanks for sharing those pics.

Amazing pics.  The Northern Lights are a wonderful phenomenon.  I've seen them down here in Southern Ontario, but I've always had to strain to see them.  Must be amazing to see them like in those pics!

Awesome pictures.  Thanks for sharing.  I have seen them MANY times and have never even attempted taking a picture.  Perhaps next time.  I usually just stare in amazement and never think to take a picture.
Those NL pics are awesome.     Thanks for sharing.  FOTB
I'm sure there's a few people out there thinking that they must be high on some form of illicit mind-altering drug.  Those pics are amazing
I would really love to see the Northern Lights in person.   FANTASTIC.     APpreciate you sharing them with us.
huey graphite, LOL  yeah could just photoshop fish into my hand too, but sometimes the real thing is better.....LOL

Awesome pics, I've seen them many times over the years and never was able to get a good picture of them. Now I'm just waiting to try my newer camera and see if I can capture them. Thanks for posting those, love good pictures.
Very nice pics..  ..i have seen them as well but not like that,they are really brite....they are amazing and can last for hours, thanks for sharing    cheeers
those are pretty amazing pics...thanks for sharing
